title: Unholy Trident
summaries: The Unholy Trident is a Hardmode magic weapon that fires fast magic tridents and has a fast fire rate, but a high mana cost. The projectiles pierce up to 2 enemies, and dissipate upon impacting a third. It has a 3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance to be dropped by Red Devils in The Underworld after defeating any mechanical boss.

statistics.Damage: 88 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 63 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Mana: 19 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 14 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 10 GC
